channel.title: RuneLord Beta*Update*
channel.description:
Base: Deltascape Previous Development: RuneLord Zombie Edition Done 100% sitting on chairs 100% Npc Dialogue - follow my tutorial! 100% all fences fixed! 80% Herblore replaced potions 100% FunPk Areas - follow my tutorial! 90% Delta glitch fixes 70% range following 70% npc clipping 95% player clipping 100% Undead Battle Fixed Syi, nulls, glitches, bugs and floods. Fixed dupe 100% Fixed xlog ( allows 1 connection ) 100% Fixed Dieng glitch at home area 100% Can hold over 100-150 players without lagging 45% Skills done: Herblore Agility Mining Smithing Smelting Fishing *not done* Construction *not yet* Domain Website: PM me for it Webclient Done 100% Sounds and Music system working 60% minigames and teleports Future updates: Casino, gambling place where you can gamble with players etc. Barrows fix. Others: Fixed cheat client no clipping Intorduction: This is RuneLord it was founded at 2010 when my friend was over and I had an idea, I teached him how to model and code items and places, I took java lessons online and made my through, I used my own methods and barley used tutorials. [b]Requested Spots: Moderator, 2 open Art Manager ( take care of client picture, ideas, chatbox etc.) Coder ( I'm only opening for the best and 1 spot only )[/b] If you are intrested in any of those spots: add me: xxlove2pkxx@hotmail.com RuneLord is a great game, its goal is for players to have fun and right now RuneLord needs beta testers! Staff: gravenfire23 - Art Manager zjbarden - html & Moderator Beta-testers: Rash Moderator Application form.
Age: Email Adress: PM me if you like. Past experience: Why you deserve this spot. Extra detail if you want to type here:
Beta test Application form.
Age: Email Adress: PM me if you like. Are you good with ideas? (yes/no) Extra detail if you want to type here:

item.title: RuneLord Beta*Update*
item.dc:creator: @zjbarden zjbarden
item.description:
@zjbarden wrote:

Sites used? You mean developed? Well, for starters, I recently started my old company back up (www.exapto.com), still doing development on there … it used to receive well over a million hits per year and had a variety of customers … not to mention it hosted my infamous (now ancient) RSPS server “Project 7” - got a good 30,000+ accounts/players.

Honestly, I program in my free time and when I get a job offer, I take it. Haha. It makes a pretty penny, and is sure fun to do!

Read full topic

item.title: RuneLord Beta*Update*
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

[code]
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;
import java.nio.MappedByteBuffer;
import java.nio.channels.FileChannel;

public class WalkingHandler {

public static final int WIDTH = 12000;
public static final int HEIGHT = 9900;

private final TiledMap map;

private WalkingHandler() {
	this.map = new TiledMap(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
}

private static class SingletonContainer {
	private static final WalkingHandler SINGLETON = new WalkingHandler();
}

public static WalkingHandler getSingleton() {
	return SingletonContainer.SINGLETON;
}

public boolean traversable(int x, int y, int direction) {
	int flag = map.getFlag(x, y);
	System.out.println(direction);
    if (direction == 0 && (flag == 1 || flag == 4 || flag == 6 || flag == 7 || flag == 9 || flag == 11 || flag == 13 || flag == 14)) {
        return false;
    } else if (direction == 4 && (flag == 1 || flag == 7 || flag == 15 || flag == 10 || flag == 11 || flag == 12 || flag == 14 || flag == 5)) {
        return false;
    } else if (direction == 8 && (flag == 1 || flag == 2 || flag == 3 || flag == 4 || flag == 5 || flag == 6 || flag == 7 || flag == 12)) {
        return false;
    } else if (direction == 12 && (flag == 1 || flag == 3 || flag == 6 || flag == 9 || flag == 10 || flag == 11 || flag == 12 || flag == 8)) {
        return false;
    } else if(flag > 0 && flag < 15) {
		return false;
	}
    return true;
}

public void initialize() throws Exception {
	long delta = System.currentTimeMillis();
	RandomAccessFile raf = new RandomAccessFile("data/lolmap.bin", "r");
	FileChannel channel = raf.getChannel();
	MappedByteBuffer buffer = channel.map(FileChannel.MapMode.READ_ONLY, 0, channel.size());
	int length = buffer.getInt();
	for(int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
		int x = buffer.getShort();
		int y = buffer.getShort();
		byte flag = buffer.get();
		map.flag(x, y, flag);
	}
	System.out.println("Loaded clipmap in " + (System.currentTimeMillis() - delta) + "ms.");
}

private static class TiledMap {

	private final byte[] plane;

	public TiledMap(int width, int height) {
		this.plane = new byte[width * 10000 + height];
	}

	public int getFlag(int x, int y) {
		return plane[x * 10000 + y];
	}

	public void flag(int x, int y, byte flag) {
		this.plane[x * 10000 + y] = flag;
	}

}

}[/code]
Theres a lot more, i cant take them all out, but heres one

Read full topic

item.title: RuneLord Beta*Update*
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

Base: Deltascape
Previous Development: RuneLord Zombie Edition Done

100% sitting on chairs

100% Npc Dialogue - follow my tutorial!

100% all fences fixed!

80% Herblore replaced potions

100% FunPk Areas - follow my tutorial!

90% Delta glitch fixes

70% range following

70% npc clipping

95% player clipping

100% Undead Battle

Fixed Syi, nulls, glitches, bugs and floods.

Fixed dupe 100%

Fixed xlog ( allows 1 connection ) 100%

Fixed Dieng glitch at home area 100%

Can hold over 100-150 players without lagging

45% Skills done:
Herblore
Agility
Mining
Smithing
Smelting
Fishing not done
Construction not yet

Domain Website: PM me for it

Webclient Done

100% Sounds and Music system working

60% minigames and teleports

Future updates:
Casino, gambling place where you can gamble with players etc.

Barrows fix.

Others:
Fixed cheat client no clipping

Intorduction:
This is RuneLord it was founded at 2010 when my friend was over and I had an idea, I teached him how to model and code items and places, I took java lessons online and made my through, I used my own methods and barley used tutorials.

Requested Spots:
Moderator, 2 open
Art Manager ( take care of client picture, ideas, chatbox etc.)
Coder ( I’m only opening for the best and 1 spot only )
If you are intrested in any of those spots: add me: xxlove2pkxx@hotmail.com

RuneLord is a great game, its goal is for players to have fun and right now RuneLord needs beta testers!

Staff:
gravenfire23 - Art Manager
zjbarden - html & Moderator
